sentences: Tema nimed on Eesti ja eestlane.
Kõik lapsed said oma nimed üles kirjutada.
Museumi eksponeeritud nimed olid täpselt need, mis oli vaja.
context: The word 'nimed' is the plural form of Estonian noun 'nimi', which means 'name'. In Estonian, nouns change their form based on case and number. 'Nimed' specifically refers to multiple names or surnames, commonly used when listing people's names or referring to several names collectively.
